channel.title: Need help please
channel.description:
I have downloaded moparscape and it comes up with the login and 2 cars next to it. When i make an account and log in its only me there and when my friend joined the same thing happened but we arent even together, I have tried joining other servers by clicking on file new server ip and adding that then adding the port but it wont work and says that the server must be down, this is the same with all the servers i have tried (10+) please help me what am i missing?
if you dont get what i mean i can post pictures showing what i do
please help me :confused:

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @howie howie
item.description:
@howie wrote:

ok thanks

and is there a way i can join someone elses server with only downloading moparscape 3.2?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

Ok you need alot of help… You need to “make” a server in roder to have friends join. go to Mod tah. sticky in tut i think. He tells you very clearly hw to make a server, and in order to have friends come join your server (public) you need to change your port in your router. Just go to this…

        http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html

Read full topic
